channel.title: Windows on Notebook
channel.description: Recent content in Windows on Notebook

item.description: Input methods # Xiaohe shuangpin 小鹤双拼 # Windows Registry Editor Version 5.00 [HKEY_CURRENT_USER\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\InputMethod\Settings\CHS] "Enable Double Pinyin"=dword:00000001 "DoublePinyinScheme"=dword:0000000a "UserDefinedDoublePinyinScheme0"="小鹤双拼*2*^*iuvdjhcwfg^xmlnpbksqszxkrltvyovt"
Winget # winget.exe install --id Microsoft.Powershell --source winget Git # winget install --id Git.Git -e --source winget After installation, copy SSH keys to ~\.ssh.
